root.name: Mario Artist: Talent Studio
root.description: Overview:Talent Studio is an art game for the Nintendo 64 DD. It was released February 23rd, 2000. It allows players to copy down faces in 3D and paint, animate, and/or color them. Users could also use a camcorder or a VCR to make movies on it through the Capture Cartridge. Players could upload pictures from the Game Boy Color on to the N64 DD. The game also contained mini-games that would be later used in WarioWare inc.
